Text:
Can you add 2 "tools" that are not actually "code" but are still protocols, which could be thought of as tools which are PGN and FEN.
Describe the changes as an array of json patches. Do not include any narrative descriptions of the change either before or after. Just print the array of Json Patch Objects.
the tools are relative to the project

Can you add 2 "tools" that are not actually "code" but are still protocols, which could be thought of as tools which are PGN and FEN.  Remember that the tools are relative to the /project/ root node.
Describe the changes as an array of json patches. Do not include any narrative descriptions of the change either before or after. Just print the array of Json Patch Objects.
